page.title: 17Smarden Village Children
page.content: In the week I get up at 7.30, dress, have breakfast and go to the bus stop. The school bus arrives at 8.30. It's 30 minutes to Tenterden, picking up pupils from Smarden & outskirts on the way. Some children have to sit 3 to a seat on our coach though it's a 53 seater. There's about 30 in my form & 1000 in the school. On Sundays I get up late, practise my clarinet & after Sunday dinner play the piano. {Farm Child}...our land is clayey and when it rains it's very sticky but when it's sunny it's as hard as rock. We have a sheep dog named Jess & some ducks. My sister likes to ride her pony but I prefer my BMX bike. We often climb trees & make camps in the thick hedges. My favourite place is jungle island in the middle of a pond. There's a secret way to it and my friends and I can hide there.
